payload.instruction_after_deploy:
**Make sure nothing goes wrong:**
1. ((https://grafana.yandex-team.ru/d/someuuid/nanny_taxi_cool_service_stable?var-dorblu_group_cool_service=dorblu_rtc_taxi_cool_service_pre_stable Grafana graphics))
2. ((https://kibana.taxi.yandex-team.ru/app/kibana#/discover?_g=%28filters:!%28%29%29&_a=%28columns:!%28_source%29,filters:!%28%28'$state':%28store:appState%29,meta:%28alias:!n,disabled:!f,index:f8e70880-c75c-11e9-8a12-ddb2ef5a51ea,key:ngroups,negate:!f,params:!%28taxi_cool_service_pre_stable%29,type:phrases,value:'taxi_cool_service_pre_stable'%29,query:%28bool:%28minimum_should_match:1,should:!%28%28match_phrase:%28ngroups:taxi_cool_service_pre_stable%29%29%29%29%29%29,%28'$state':%28store:appState%29,meta:%28alias:!n,disabled:!f,index:f8e70880-c75c-11e9-8a12-ddb2ef5a51ea,key:level,negate:!f,params:!%28ERROR,WARNING%29,type:phrases,value:'ERROR,+WARNING'%29,query:%28bool:%28minimum_should_match:1,should:!%28%28match_phrase:%28level:ERROR%29%29,%28match_phrase:%28level:WARNING%29%29%29%29%29%29%29,index:f8e70880-c75c-11e9-8a12-ddb2ef5a51ea,interval:auto,query:%28language:kuery,query:''%29,sort:!%28'@timestamp',desc%29%29 Kibana service logs))
3. ((https://yasm.yandex-team.ru/panel/robot-taxi-clown.nanny_taxi_cool_service_stable Golovan graphics))
4. Any other tools for checking deployment results

**How to rollback to last working deploy:**
1. Find your last successful deployment in ((/services/1/edit/1/deployments deployments))
2. Push "Rollback" ("Перевыкатить") and set this release ticket %%TAXIADMIN-10000%%
3. Wait for instructions from the robot

More information in ((https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/taxi/backend/basichowto/deploy/ deployment wiki))
Typical problems are described in ((https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/taxi/backend/Clowny-platform/ F.A.Q.))
